title: Careers In Cannabis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Brian Sekandi started careerscannabis.com, the first job search engine for the cannabis industry in North America. Simplifying the application process and improving the recruitment experience with digital technology. He also wrote a book, Kids In Cannabis, to further understanding and lessen the stigma around working in the industry. Incremental change in improving industry standards around hiring. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
